title: Vaishnavi Emerald & Diamond Floral Haaram - A Timeless Masterpiece
materials: Zambian Origin). Features Hyderabadi polish for a lustrous finish.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a delicate floral design meticulously handcrafted by our master artisans. The necklace features a vine-like structure crafted with diamonds, leading down to floral motifs adorned with central Emeralds surrounded by a halo of diamonds. The flower-shaped pendant in the center features a larger square cushion-cut Emerald, encased in diamonds to create a focal point of unparalleled elegance. The setting style allows maximum light reflection for both the diamonds and emeralds.
occasions: and high-profile events. Makes a striking statement for Seemantham (baby shower) or half-saree functions.
description: This Haaram is a testament to timeless elegance and exceptional craftsmanship. The brilliant-cut diamonds provide unparalleled sparkle, while the natural emeralds bring a touch of regal sophistication. Each gemstone is carefully selected for its superior quality and color. The design marries traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern sensibilities, making it a versatile piece for both classic and contemporary wardrobes. Owning this piece signifies an appreciation for artistry and a commitment to preserving cultural heritage.
